structure.unit: Department Of Youth Services And Massachusetts Training Schools

law.catch_line: Transfers From Massachusetts Reformatory And Reformatory For Women
law.text: With the consent of the department, the commissioner of correction may transfer to the care of the department any boy under seventeen sentenced to the Massachusetts reformatory, or any girl under seventeen sentenced to the reformatory for women, for such disposition as in the opinion of the department, after study, will best serve the needs of the boy or girl and best protect the interests of the public.
